content: hey all; I'm not sure where the right place for this is; but there's a ton of spam in the Rust matrix channel and if any mods there see this it would be nice to have the channel locked till the source of the spam is addressed...
cc @Khionu Sybiern @technetos (who are not necessarily Matrix mods, but who may know the right people to contact)
The admin just started to ban the spammers, so it seems to be resolved! Thank you.
I don't think we manage the Matrix?

Hello all.. I am software engineer working on Big Data engineering space - mostly Spark, Kubernetes on Cloud. Mostly experienced with Java Scala.. Trying to see how to get most from Rust.. I have been very impressed so far.. few concepts are still alien to me but I am getting in there..
